messages.message:
@Vikas Mehta I ran the dbupdate script locally. But you can also use this yaml after following the instructions in this thread.
```apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: job-onprem-dbupdate
  namespace: instabase
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: onprem-dbupdate-prod
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: onprem-dbupdate
          image: "gcr.io/instabase-dev/onprem-dbupdate:anil--22.04.27-6d61375847 (http://gcr.io/instabase-dev/onprem-dbupdate:anil--22.04.27-6d61375847)"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          env:
            - name: LOG_LEVEL
              value: "DEBUG"
            - name: CONFIG_TYPE
              value: "prod"
            - name: INSTABASE_BACKEND_DB_PARAMS
              value: ""
            - name: DB_MAX_IDLE_CONNS
              value: "1"
            - name: DB_MAX_OPEN_CONNS
              value: "10"
            - name: DB_TLS_ENABLE
              value: "False"
            - name: DB_TLS_ROOT_CERT_PATH
              value: ""
            - name: DB_TLS_ENABLE_CLIENT_CERT
              value: "False"
            - name: DB_TLS_CLIENT_KEY_PATH
              value: ""
            - name: DB_TLS_CLIENT_CERT_PATH
              value: ""
            - name: DB_TLS_CERT_HOSTNAME
              value: ""
            - name: DB_TLS_SKIP_VERIFY
              value: "False"
            - name: DB_AZURE_AD_CERT_ENABLE
              value: "False"
            - name: DB_AZURE_AD_CERT_PATH
              value: ""
            - name: DB_AZURE_AD_CERT_PASSWORD
              value: ""
            - name: DB_AZURE_AD_KEY_PATH
              value: ""
            - name: CHECK_STATUS
              value: "False"
            - name: VALIDATE_ONLY
              value: "False"
            - name: DO_UPDATE
              value: "True"
            - name: FORCE
              value: "True"
            - name: DO_CLEANUP
              value: "False"
            - name: RELEASE_BRANCH
              value: "master"
            - name: RELEASE_TAG
              value: "22.04.0-423-g6d61375847"
            - name: RELEASE_COMMIT_ID
              value: "6d6137584700656f6483f9af8078d1975ef6f002"
            - name: RELEASE_USERNAME
              value: "anil"
            - name: RELEASE_TIMESTAMP
              value: "Wed Apr 27 11:54:01 PDT 2022"
          resources:
            requests:
              cpu: 100m
              memory: 64Mi
      restartPolicy: OnFailure```
